name: 5MP LincX2Pro WiFi Video Doorbell
description: 5 MegaPixel 2K LincX2Pro Series WiFi Doorbell camera with Human Detection
extended_description:
Description

This 5MP doorbell camera is a great choice to protect your home.  Most Doorbell cameras only provide cloud recording at expensive monthly charges with poor quality video because of the bandwidth limitations of upload.  This Dahua™ LincX2Pro WiFi Video Doorbell connects to your home WiFi, but has both a DMSS app to allow you to talk to someone on your doorstep, but also streams video via ONVIF to any NVR recorder.  This means that you can get the full quality of recording from your doorbell camera with audio and video recording.

Ditch the cloud-based cameras and monthly fees, while maintaining the great doorbell camera features you love.  This camera connects to your existing 24VAC doorbell system to operate your mechanical or digital doorbell (can be configured through the DMSS app).  It connects to your 2.4 OR 5 Ghz WiFi with its built-in Dual-Band IEEE802.11a/b/g/n/ac network card.  Includes capabilities for edge storage, supporting up to 256GB MicroSD card.

Built-in infrared lights allow you to see even in compete darkness up to 15 feet away, and optional visual white-light technology for visual deterrence can be activated when the built in human detection is enabled.  

Combine this camera with our AVM NVR recorders or AVM NVR software for best quality recording and functionality.

Features

   This 5MP Doorbell camera delivers great quality video for homes and is the clear choice when replacing your Ring or Nest doorbell camera.

  • HD 2K Video quality (2560x1920 Resolution)
  • 5 MegaPixel CMOS Image Sensor
  • H.265/H.264 Video Compression = smaller file size
  • Wide 124° viewing angle for better room coverage
  • 3D Digital Noise Reduction
  • Infrared night vision up to 15' in pitch black conditions
  • Dual Band 2.4Ghz/5Ghz WiFi
  • Built-in 200 mAh Lithium Battery
  • 2560 x 1920 at 15 fps maximum
  • Built-in Human detection filter
  • Five-Year warranty from Dahua
  • Supports 12-24 VDC & 16-24 VAC power
  • Includes wall mount bracket and angled bracket
keywords: DH-DB6I, Doorbell, dahua, LincX2Pro, 5MP, 2K, WiFi, IP camera
imagecaption1: 2K 5MP LincX2Pro WiFi Doorbell Camera
imagecaption2: Back of Doorbell camera - MicroSD Slot
imagecaption3: DH-DB6i Doorbell package contents
title: LincX2Pro 5MP WiFi Video Doorbell Camera with Human Detect

name: HD-8419 2K Resolution NDAA Approved 4.0 MegaPixel HD Turret IP camera with 2.8mm Lens for Wide View and IR Night vision for Public Funded and Government Jobs
categories: Cameras/HD IP Cameras@Cameras/SMART HD IP Cameras@Cameras/NDAA Approved Cameras@Cameras/Turrets
description: 4 MegaPixel 2K HD IP turret camera with infrared night vision, WDR and Smart IR
extended_description:
Description

The HD-8419 model UNV™ brand NDAA Approved 2K Resolution HD IP turret-style camera is a 4MP camera approved for use in government buildings, and other public funded jobs. It provides 2K resolution video in color during the daytime with Infrared IR night vision at night when light levels drop.

The HD-8419 camera is our NDAA Approved mid-resolution model of our turret-style cameras, providing up to 2K resolution video video with a 2.8mm super wide angle lens and crisp, clear infrared night vision using IR LEDs for optimum quality during the daytime and at night.

Even though this turret camera is designed with outdoor installations in mind, it fits into any environment due to its smaller size. This camera has an easy to adjust 3 axis housing, allowing this camera to be mounted either on an overhang, wall or even sitting on top of a parapet. The front of this security camera has 2 isolated glass lenses, one for the HD lens and the other for the IR array LED. Isolating these 2 lenses ensures that no matter what happens, you will always have the best possible clarity, both in daytime and at night. This makes this camera an optimal choice for any outdoor camera installations especially.

The fact that these cameras are just as lightweight as their dome counterparts, and glass lenses for durability, make these cameras also a popular choice for interior camera installations, especially in areas where humidity, moisture or dust persist: warehouses, restaurant kitchens, manufacturing facilities and much more.

This camera delivers night vision with its built-in IR LEDs, so that the camera can see in complete darkness up to 100' maximum distance. These LEDs are combined with an IR cut filter, this automatically slides across to filter IR light during the daytime, which helps to provide beautiful, true colors during daytime hours by blocking excess IR light, while still delivering great IR night vision in black and white mode during evening hours. The IR filter can be automatically actuated by the built in optical sensor (default) or programmed to switch at a specific time, or remain in a predefined mode.

The HD-8419 HD IP Camera can be enhanced with optional backbox for direct wall mount allowing cables to be concealed, wall bracket for suspended installation or even pole mount for mounting it directly to a pole.

We recommend our NDAA Approved AVM NVR software or AVM NVR recorders combined with these NDAA Approved IP cameras, as our AVM software is programmed to provide you the best features with the Deep-Learning A.I. capabilities that are built in to this camera. When combined with our AVM NVRs, you can setup alerts when someone is approaching your business after hours, or search to see every vehicle that enters your property or even drives by on the street. These AI SMART camera capabilities make your security camera system more proactive so you can really know what is happening on your property.

Features

This Feature-Rich turret camera delivers great quality video for home and business from a small housing.

  • HD 2K Resolution Video quality (2688x1520 Resolution)
  • 4.0 MegaPixel CMOS Image Sensor
  • Enhanced AI Capabilities with Human/Vehicle Detection Filters for VCA capabilities
  • H.264 Video Compression = smaller file size
  • Dual Stream H.265/H.264
  • Wide ~120° viewing angle for better room coverage
  • 3D Digital Noise Reduction
  • Infrared night vision up to 100' in pitch black conditions
  • Small Armor Turret housing
  • Glass front with isolated lenses for better night vision
  • DWDR function for better day and night vision
  • 3-axis adjustment allows mounting on ceiling or wall
  • 20 fps video for smooth clear picture
  • PoE Support - run just a single CAT-5 to the camera from PoE Switch
  • IP67 Weatherproof housing
  • Optional wall mount bracket & backbox available
  • ONVIF 2.0 Compliant - Works with most NVR Software
keywords: HD-8419, HD8419, 4 MegaPixel, 4 MP, 2K, turret, security camera, surveillance, cctv, IP camera, outdoor camera, indoor camera, infrared, IR, night vision
imagecaption1: 2K 5 MegaPixel HD IP camera with Infrared Night vision
imagecaption2: Weatherproof RJ-45 connection for easy installation inside or outside
imagecaption3: ONVIF compatible for use with virtually any NVR software or Standalone NVR
title: HD-8519 NDAA Approved 5MP 2K turret security camera w/AI

name: HD-8849 - NDAA Approved - 4K Outdoor IR Turret Camera with Electronic Zoom Lens
categories: Cameras/HD IP Cameras@Cameras/SMART HD IP Cameras@Cameras/NDAA Approved Cameras@Cameras/Turrets
extended_description:
Description

The HD-8849 model UNV™ brand NDAA Approved 4K Resolution HD IP turret-style camera is a 8MP camera approved for use in government buildings, and other public funded jobs. It provides 4K resolution video in color during the daytime with Infrared IR nightvision at night when light levels drop.

The HD-8849 camera is our NDAA Approved mid-resolution model of our turret-style cameras, providing up to 4K resolution video video with an electronically adjustable auto-focus 2.8-12mm zoom lens to allow you to custom-tailor your width of view. It also provides clear infrared night vision using IR LEDs for optimum quality during the daytime and at night.

The armored metal housing of the HD-8849 camera protects it from would-be vandals and is sealed against the elements completely with IP67 weatherproof rating. This turret camera is sealed not only against water but also against dust, dirt and grease in the air, making it an ideal camera for even the roughest installations, whether manufacturing facilities, warehouses or outside directly in the elements.

For optimum night vision capabilities, this camera has a 3rd generation array LED concealed behind a split glass lens to provide up to 100' infrared night vision even in complete darkness. The IR light is received by the image sensor through our upgraded IR cut filter. This combination ensures this camera will deliver crisp, clear video even in complete darkness.

The 8th Generation video processing chip provides superior quality video processing with up to 16Mbps bit rate to provide improved video motion quality, and artificial intelligence with VCA, providing smart searching capabilities for enhanced video searching for line cross, face detection and zone detection. These built-in intelligence features incorporate with advanced NVR software platforms, like our AVM (Advanced Video Management) platform to perform faster video searching for persons or vehicles.

The HD-8849 HD IP Camera can be enhanced with optional backbox for direct wall mount allowing cables to be conceiled, wall bracket for suspended installation or even pole mount for mounting it directly to a pole.

 

Features

This Feature-Rich turret camera delivers great quality video for home and business from a small housing.

  • HD 4K Resolution Video quality (3840x2160 Resolution)
  • 8.0 MegaPixel CMOS Image Sensor
  • H.265+ Video Compression = smaller file size
  • Dual Stream H.265/H.264
  • Electronically Adjustable 2.8-12mm motorized zoom lens
  • 3D Digital Noise Reduction
  • Infrared night vision up to 100' in pitch black conditions
  • Armored Turret housing
  • Glass front with isolated lenses for better night vision
  • DWDR function for better day and night vision
  • 3-axis adjustment allows mounting on ceiling or wall
  • 15-30 fps video for smooth clear picture
  • PoE Support - run just a single CAT-5 to the camera from PoE Switch
  • IP67 Weatherproof housing
  • Optional wall mount bracket & backbox available
  • ONVIF 2.0 Compliant - Works with most NVR Software

name: 4MP Dahua 2K Resolution Color Fusion Color Night Vision Camera w/2.8mm Lens
description: 4 MegaPixel 2K Color Fusion Color Night vision dual image sensor camera with Human Detection
extended_description:
Description

This exceptional low-light color night vision Dahua camera breaks the mold of color night vision cameras.  This camera provides amazing low-light color night vision even in star light by fusing together video from dual image sensors.  One image sensor picks up the low light color, while the other picks up infrared night vision in black and white.  This allows this camera to fuse the images from the 2 image sensors together to provide amazing low-light color capabilities without smearing like other competitors' low light color cameras.  

It takes a lot to surprise us when it comes to camera technology, as we have been in the industry for 20 years, but Dahua has certainly done it with this camera.  This innovative camera is ideal for installation into bars, restaurants and any other low light interior or exterior environment, to provide you with optimal viewing.  Built-in microphone also allows you to optionally record audio.

This amazing low light camera also includes human and vehicle detection filters to be used with our AVM NVR system to provide a plethora of alerting and searching features for intrusion zones and trip lines.

Combine this camera with our AVM NVR recorders or AVM NVR software for best quality recording and functionality.

Features

   This 5MP Doorbell camera delivers great quality video for homes and is the clear choice when replacing your Ring or Nest doorbell camera.

  • HD 2K Video quality (2688x1520 Resolution)
  • 4 MegaPixel CMOS Image Sensor
  • H.265/H.264 Video Compression = smaller file size
  • Audio Microphone for optional audio recording
  • Wide 97° viewing angle for better room coverage
  • 3D Digital Noise Reduction
  • COLOR FUSION night vision
  • 2688 x 1520 at 30 fps maximum
  • Built-in Human and Vehicle detection filter
  • 3-Year limited warranty from Dahua
  • Supports 12-24 VDC & 16-24 VAC power
  • Optional Junction Box for mounting
keywords: DH-N45DUD2, Dahua, Color Fusion, 4MP, 2K, color night vision, turret

Isolating these 2 lenses ensures that no matter what happens, you will always have the best possible clarity, both in daytime and at night. This makes this camera an optimal choice for any outdoor camera installations especially.

The fact that these cameras are just as lightweight as their dome counterparts, and glass lenses for durability, make these cameras also a popular choice for interior camera installations, especially in areas where humidity, moisture or dust persist: warehouses, restaurant kitchens, manufacturing facilities and much more.

This camera delivers night vision with its built-in IR LEDs, so that the camera can see in complete darkness up to 100' maximum distance. These LEDs are combined with an IR cut filter, this automatically slides across to filter IR light during the daytime, which helps to provide beautiful, true colors during daytime hours by blocking excess IR light, while still delivering great IR night vision in black and white mode during evening hours. The IR filter can be automatically actuated by the built in optical sensor (default) or programmed to switch at a specific time, or remain in a predefined mode.

The HD-8219 HD IP Camera can be enhanced with optional backbox for direct wall mount allowing cables to be conceiled, wall bracket for suspended installation or even pole mount for mounting it directly to a pole.

We recommend our NDAA Approved AVM NVR software or AVM NVR recorders combined with these NDAA Approved IP cameras, for best picture quality.

Features

This Feature-Rich turret camera delivers great quality video for home and business from a small housing.

  • HD 1080P Resolution Video quality (1920x1080 Resolution)
  • 2.0 MegaPixel CMOS Image Sensor
  • H.264 Video Compression = smaller file size
  • Dual Stream H.265/H.264
  • Wide ~100° viewing angle for better room coverage
  • 3D Digital Noise Reduction
  • Infrared night vision up to 100' in pitch black conditions
  • Small Armor Turret housing
  • Glass front with isolated lenses for better night vision
  • DWDR function for better day and night vision
  • 3-axis adjustment allows mounting on ceiling or wall
  • 20 fps video for smooth clear picture
  • PoE Support - run just a single CAT-5 to the camera from PoE Switch
  • IP66 Weatherproof housing
  • Optional wall mount bracket & backbox available
  • ONVIF 2.0 Compliant - Works with most NVR Software

name: PoE Lightning Arrestor
extended_description: The Network Surge Protector Suppressors protects a single data line, including computer network signals, communication equipments and more. Insert a Network Surge Protector in your data cables, and connect them to the ground, to prevent lightning surging, so as not to damage your devices.  Multi-level protection circuit, high-speed protection accessories, low capacitance design, fast response, low output residual voltage and superior transmission performance.  The standard RJ45 shielded interface of Ethernet Network Surge Protector is suitable for overvoltage protection of ETHERNET 10/100M BASET network equipment (such as SWTICH, HUB, ROUTER). It suppresses high-voltage pulses on the line and protects the back-end equipment from lightning and industrial surges.  There is no "In" or "Out" cable side of this device, both sides are identical RJ-45 Interface. Regardless of whether your protected device is behind any particular side, it can work properly by connecting the correct cables.

name: AVM IP Camera NVR Software
extended_description:
Find video in seconds not hours!

Faster access to video with easy searching = You use your video more!

Our AVM software for IP cameras allows you access to your IP cameras like never before.   The recorder is the most important part of your security camera system.  That is why we have spent 20 years and countless hours perfecting the access to your security cameras.  Other systems funnel HD security cameras through overloaded processors with cludgy software.  At Platinum CCTV we believe in building from the core up.  We started with access to recorded video, which unfortunately is neglected in LTS, HIK, Dahua and other NVRs that are on the market.  With our AVM NVR software, you can scan through days, weeks or even months of video in a matter of seconds.  20 years ago, we pioneered access to your recorded video, and have only improved from there, adding in access for A.I. cameras, LPR cameras with ANPR license plate reading technology and smart video motion searching for even faster video access.  This advanced-capability NVR software records from your IP cameras onto your computer hard drive and provides industry-leading access to the recorded video. This innovative software lets you scan through your video visually, allowing you to even see in a matter of seconds what happened in hours or days. The easy access to your video means that you will use your video for more than just a major burglary or theft. With instant access to your video, it will now be useful to see everything that happened at your home or business while you were away.

Real Time Remote Access

View cameras from all your devices, from anywhere!

This NVR software has some of the most advanced remote access capabilities of any DVR or NVR software, we have been using this platform for viewing our security cameras over the internet from cell phones since the days of the flip-phone and have continued to evolve this access. This dedication to remote access ensures that you will always have instant access to your video over the internet in real time. Apps are available for BlackBerry, Android, Windows Phones and of course iOS. But remote access isn't enough. With todays HD IP cameras, most systems will only allow a partial view of your video. With our AVM Netcam software, you can even zoom in to see the full quality and resolution of your HD IP cameras.

Support for all IP Camera Resolutions

Compatible with most IP cameras




No matter what IP cameras you use, our Netcam AVM NVR software delivers the ability to connect to and record your cameras in style. Upgrade inferior IP camera systems by replacing your recorder with a PC running our NVR software to improve your recording, motion detection and remote access. This software supports most major brands of IP cameras including, but not limited to Axis, Arecont Vision, Vivotek, Sanyo, Samsung, Acti, Mobotix, Messoa, Platinum CCTV, Ganz, and many more. It also supports generic IP cameras with ONVIF and RTSP streaming protocols. The AVM Netcam software supports all resolutions of security cameras from 320x240 all the way up to 10 MegaPixel and beyond.

Remote Video Backup

Keep your video secure, no matter what



Built in to each of our AVM systems, is a remote recording/backup feature, which allows you to duplicate all video that records on your server onto an off-site location (or multiple locations). This allows you to keep your video data secure, even if someone were to steal or destroy your video server. Distributed remote recording is still housed on your PCs on the remote locations, so there is no cloud-access security issues that are associated with other low-cost IP camera cloud services. Best of all, because it uses your computers and internet connection, there is no ongoing monthly fees associated with this remote recording option.

Easily Expand Your Security

Expand with more IP, HD-SDI or Analog





With our AVM systems, you can easily expand your home or business security at any time by adding Analong, HD-SDI or additional HD-IP cameras. This system ensures that you will always be able to expand your security as your needs evolve.

Ultimate Security

Know even if someone TRIES to access your cameras




In today's world, hearing about hacking is commonplace. In the security camera industry, it is unfortunately pretty common to hear about someone hacking into an IP camera to watch remotely. This is why our AVM camera system is designed with your security and safety in mind. This system can be setup to even provide you with alerts anytime someone even attempts to access your cameras. This helps you make sure your video is secure. Our AVM software is also compatible with all VPNs and dual NIC cards to isolate your IP cameras. Need help planning a secure IP camera installation? Call us and we will help!

Stay in touch with Alerts!

Motion Email & Text Alerts, Alarm Integration and MORE

Really integrate your home or business by connecting this AVM system with optional USB I/O Alarm card to any alarm system, home or business automation system, or even access control systems. By integrating your cameras further with your home or business, you can have your system alert you when people are approaching, employees arrive or leave, or infinite other possible triggers. The AVM system has a better scheduling engine than most home automation controllers, allowing you to control camera recording, text alerts, PTZ camera positions and much much more based on time, alarm inputs and other factors smoothly. With our AVM system you are informed and in control!

POS Overlay Integration

Optional POS System Integration for Businesses

Upgrade your business management and security at the same time with our optional POS system integration. This system add-on allows you to connect your cash registers even to the HD IP cameras included in this package. Data is pulled in over the network, providing you with transaction, cashier data and much more...so that you can now even search for video based on employee discounts, transaction amounts, cashiers, registers and much more. This goes way beyond the simple analog text overlay you have seen elsewhere, this is a full database stored with your video so that you can really be in control and stay informed of what is happening at your business.

Most Powerful Scheduling

Control everything that happens




The core of our AVM software, is an enhanced scheduling engine. This provides you with the ability to schedule complex alerts that can be based on camera motion, signal loss, alarm inputs, analytics alerts, system events and much more. You can even layer multiple events simultaneously to ensure when you get an alert it is something you want to see. Use the scheduler to control lights and other devices based on any event with optional IO card. This makes it a powerful automated business or home controller.

We've Got Your Back!

Industry Leading Technical Support



From instructional videos and walkthroughs to live remote technical support and online chats, we have your back every step of the way. You don?t have to be a tech guru to get our systems up and running, because you have an entire team of specialists behind you. Whether you install systems for a living, or have never touched a camera before, we?ll get you up and running in no time at all.

name: Long Range 2K Resolution Electronic Zoom Camera with DeepinView Technology
categories: Cameras/HD IP Cameras@Cameras/SMART HD IP Cameras@Cameras/LPR & ANPR Cameras
extended_description:
Description

This long range HIKVision bullet camera is ideal for long-range zoom, with a motorized 4.7-118mm Motorized zoom lens, it can be placed a larger distance away from the area being viewed while still providing excellent quality video at 2K resolution.

Note: This camera does NOT have ANPR (Automatic Number Plate Recognition) technology, but can be tuned to provide human readable license plates at a much longer distance than the alternate ANPR capable cameras.

 

Features

This Feature-Rich license plate capture camera delivers great quality video for business applications where license plate capture is needed.

  • HD 2K Resolution Video quality (2688x1520 Resolution)
  • 4.0 MegaPixel CMOS Image Sensor
  • Smooth 30 FPS frame rate for smooth video
  • H.265+ Video Compression = smaller file size
  • Dual Stream H.265/H.264
  • Electronically Adjustable 4.7-118mm motorized zoom lens
  • 3D Digital Noise Reduction
  • Infrared night vision up to 200 meters in pitch black conditions
  • Armored Bullet housing
  • Glass front with isolated lenses for better night vision
  • DWDR function for better day and night vision
  • 3-axis adjustment allows mounting on ceiling or wall
  • PoE Support - run just a single CAT-5 to the camera from PoE Switch
  • IP67 Weatherproof housing
  • Optional corner mount bracket & backbox available
  • ONVIF 2.0 Compliant - Works with most NVR Software

name: CAT-6e Riser (CMR) Solid Copper Cable for Data and PoE - White
extended_description:
Description

High Quality solid copper Cat-6e CMR cable (riser).  This is not the cheap CCA cable that many places are selling to cut costs.  It is important that you use solid copper CAT-6e for any PoE applications, as CCA cable is not rated for PoE applications and actually poses a fire risk in these areas.  This White color CAT-5e will suit all of your security camera and PoE application needs where Riser rated cable is appropriate.

  • CMR-Rated (Riser)
  • Solid copper 24 AWG copper conductor
  • NOT CCA (Copper Clad Aluminum)
  • 4-Pair unshielded twisted pair (UTP) cable
  • High Density polyethylene insulation with PVC jacket
  • White color jacket
  • 1000' easy payload box

name: 48-Port Gigabit PoE+ Managed Switch for IP Cameras (48 ports PoE+, 600W Power budget, 256Gbps Switching)
extended_description: About this item Gigabit Ports: 48 gigabit ethernet ports, 4 gigabit SFP, switching capacity is 256Gbps, each port can reach 1G rate at the same time, with higher data throughput. 16K Mac address table, more devices can be connected and can be used in large networks  High POE Power 600W: Ports 1-4 support IEEE802.3af/at/bt, max 90W. Ports 5-48 support IEEE802.3af/at, max 30W. Built-in power supply, the whole machine supports 600W. *Please note: it will not supply power to passive 24V PoE and NON-PoE devices.*  Web Managed: Support POE port and Layer 2 management, such as VLAN, Port Aggregation/Mirroring/Isolation, Speed Limitation, Flow Control, QoS, Port Security, Spanning Tree, Multicast, DoS defend, Storm control, DHCP Snooping. Support WEB/ClI/SNMP.  Smart Heat Dissipation: Using 2 industrial-grade fans, intelligent design, automatic start and stop according to the power used, automatic adjustment of the speed, more energy saving and extended use time.  Widely Used: Support status query, port statistics, fault detection, easy-to-use maintenance and management. Durable Metal housing, 1U rackmount, widely used in home/business/project PoE network.
keywords: PoE, gigabig, 48-port, 48, switch, switching, managed, layer 2,

name: HD-TVI to FHD HDMI Video Converter Adapter
extended_description: Converts HD-TVI/AHD/CVI/CVBS security camera signals to 1080P HDMI Output effectively. The converter has HD-TVI/AHD/CVI/CVBS Input (BNC) x 1, Loop Out (BNC) x 1, and HDMI Output x 1.  Recognizes HD-TVI/AHD/CVI V4.0 Resolution Automatically. HD-TVI & CVI from 720P @25/30/50/60 FPS up to 4K (3840x2160P) @12.5/15 FPS, and HD-AHD from 720P @25/30 FPS up to 4K (3840x2160P) @15 FPS. CVBS up to 1000TVL. Please check the picture for the Resolution Table.  Support HDMI output x1 (V1.4b) up to 1080P resolution. Lossless real time non-compression conversion. Coaxial cable impedance: 75 Ohm. Long Transmission Distance from 500 to 700 meters over Coax Cable.  Multiple HD BNC to HDMI converters can be used as a video splitter to connect one HD camera to multiple HDMI monitors. Please check the picture for the application.  Plug and Play, no driver needed, LED indicators for power and HD-TVI/AHD/CVI signal source sync.

name: HDMI Extender By Single CAT5e Adapter
extended_description: MAXIMUM BANDWIDTH UP TO 6.75GBPS - HDMI Over Ethernet Extender Support HDMI 1.4 & 1.3 signal /deep color 36bit/xv-YCC/1080p 24fs/DTS-HD.v-YCC/1080p 24fs/DTS-HD.  EXTEND VIDEO SIGNAL UP TO 200FT -  For 200ft transmit distance via CAT6/CAT7 LAN cable. For 165ft transmit distance via CAT5e cable.  Zero Video Latency. NOTE: We recommend using direct HDMI to HDMI connections, avoid using signal converters or adapters at all costs.  SUPPORTS A VARIETY OF VIDEO FORMATS - HDCP 1.2/1.4 ; 1080P/1080i/720P/576P/576i/480P/480i; 3D video supported  VIDEO COLOR & AUDIO TRANSMISSION - 36bit(CAT7); 24bit(CAT6); Supports 2-channel PCM audio only. Supports Dolby Digital / DTS pass through if copied EDID from right display devices.  OPTIMIZE PERFORMANCE - For better picture quality and longer distance transfer, we recommend to using Cat6 cable. For better performance, we suggest using solid COPPER ethernet cable with this product.
keywords: HDMI, CAT5, EXTENDER, ADAPTER

name: PoE+ Extender - Weatherproof
extended_description: Gigabit Power over Ethernet 802.3bt PoE+ extender, single port wall mount for outdoor use  Extends 55 volts, 60 watts of power and 10/100/1000 data up to 500 feet for devices like Wireless APs, Base Stations, Network Cameras and more  Active PoE protects non-PoE devices and adjusts output capacity for the Powered Device  Weatherproof for outdoor installation. DO NOT SUBMERGE OR BURY - Includes Water Resistant IP67 compliant watertight glands for standard RJ45 connections and 6KV Surge protection
keywords: POE, POE+, EXTENDER, WEATHERPROOF, OUTDOOR, GIGABIT, POWER OVER ETHERNET

name: PoE+ Extender - Indoor
extended_description: Gigabit Speed. The PoE Extender features one 10/100/1000Mbps PoE+ input port and one 10/100/1000Mbps PoE+ output port.  Compatible with IEEE802.3at and IEEE802.3af. Auto-sensing technology conveniently delivers the correct wattage needed to power your PoE (15.4W) or PoE+ (30W) device.  Extends a PoE / PoE+ network connection an additional 100m for a total distance of up to 200m (656 ft.) from the PoE power source equipment.  Daisy chain support connect up to 3 PoE Extenders for a total PoE+ network extension of 400m (1,312 ft.).  Wall-Mount design, Plug and Play, no other settings required.
keywords: POE, POE+, EXTENDER, INDOOR, GIGABIT, POWER OVER ETHERNET

name: USB Extender over CAT5E
extended_description: Extend your USB 1.0/1.1 connection to distances up to 150 feet using this USB Extender over Cat5/Cat6!  This simple USB adapter converts USB signals into a form that can be transmitted over Ethernet cable, then reassembled into a standard USB signal at the other end.  The adapter draws all power necessary from the USB bus, so no external power source is required.  Compatible with any USB compatible device, including any USB-equipped computer, game consoles, USB cameras, printers, keyboards, mice, etc.  Note that this adapter supports USB 1.0/1.1 speeds only. It is not compatible with USB 2.0 or USB 3.0 speeds.
keywords: USB, CAT5, EXTENDER, ADAPTER, EXTENSION, CONNECTOR, USB1.0

name: POE Over Coax Converter
extended_description: POE & IP Over Coax converter can be used to upgrade analog systems to an IP surveillance system while using existing coaxial cable. Compatible with RG59, RG6, RG11 cables. Supports POE standards 802.3af (PoE) and 802.3at (PoE+). EOC Receiver MUST be powered by POE switch or POE injector while Transmitter should be connected with POE devices or NON-POE devices.  Each pair of EOC(Ethernet over Coax) Converter is equipped with 2 BNC Twist Pair connectors, which enables POE over Twist Pair transmission. 100Mbps bandwidth over 330ft regular twist pair cables while 10Mbps over 1485ft for both POE or NON-POE devices.  Industrial design, with built-in heat sink, ensures reliability and hassle free transmission. Indoor use ONLY. Plug-and-play, configuration free, makes installation simple.  Acts as MoCA (Multimedia over Coax) in point-to-point connection, transmit video/audio/data/control signal over coaxial cable, so as being used with twist pair. EOC Receiver should be powered by POE switch or POE injector while Transmitter should be connected with POE devices or NON-POE devices.  Small design (3.1"x2.0"x0.9") and light weight.
keywords: COAX, RG11, RG59, RG56, POE, INJECTOR, TRANSMITTER, CONVERTER, BNC, MOCA, EOC

name: BNC to VGA Video Converter
extended_description: EASY to PLAY: Plug and Play. No driver software required. The Video Converters is a must have to keep older devices with new modern PC monitor or LCD.  GOOD COMPATIBILITY: VGA, 4 pin S-video, BNC input. VGA output. Convert VGA/S-video/BNC to VGA. The Video Converters Supports output from 800*600 to 1920*1200 VGA resolution.
keywords: VGA, S-VIDEO, BNC, CONVERTER, ADAPTER, VIDEO CONVERTER, INPUT, OUTPUT

name: HDMI Splitter 1-In/2-Out
extended_description: 1 HDMI INPUT TO 2 HDMI OUTPUTS - This affordable 1x2 HDMI splitter allows users to split one HDMI input signal into two HDMI output displays simultaneously.  MIX DIFFERENT DISPLAY RESOLUTIONS - A Multi-Resolution Output (MRO) feature lets users send a compatible HDMI signal to output displays with different resolutions.  SUPPORTS ALL HD AUDIO FORMATS - Supports all HD audio formats, including PCM, Dolby Digital, Dolby True HD, Dolby Atmos, DTS, DTS HD, DTS: X and Dolby Digital +.  HDMI 2.0 STANDARD HDR 10 & EDID COPY ABILITIES - Supports 18Gbps bandwidth, resolutions up to 4K@60Hz 4:4:4, HDR 10 and Dolby Vision HDCP 2.3 Compliant. EDID Copy priority is Output 1> Output 2.
keywords: HDMI, SPLIT, SPLITTER, 1 IN, 2 OUT, INPUT, OUTPUT, HD, HDMI 2.0
